Irish Pub St Patricks Day Value Bundle Celebrate St. Patrick's Day in style with this massive bundle of themed items. As if that wasn't enough, we've thrown in a special St. Patrick's themed version of the pub, complete with Darts game, so you can enjoy good times and great craic with your friends.
 
 This bundle includes:
 ・The Irish Pub with Darts Game
 ・Giant Shamrock - Female
 ・Giant Shamrock - Male
 ・Pot of Gold
 ・Massive Bow Tie - Female
 ・Massive Bow Tie - Male
 ・Born Lucky Waistcoat - Female
 ・Born Lucky Waistcoat - Male
 ・Green Top Hat - Female
 ・Green Top Hat - Male
 ・Leprechaun Beard - Female
 ・Leprechaun Beard - Male
 ・Leprechaun Trousers and Shoes - Female
 ・Leprechaun Trousers and Shoes - Male
 ・Leprechaun Jacket - Female
 ・Leprechaun Jacket - Male
 ・Leprechaun Hat - Female
 ・Leprechaun Hat - Male
 ・Leprechaun Shillelagh - Female
 ・Leprechaun Shillelagh - Male
 ・Leprechaun Companion
